data.text: Yehova akuti, “ ‘Pa nthawi imeneyo, mafupa a mafumu ndi a akuluakulu a ku Yuda, mafupa a ansembe ndi a aneneri, ndiponso mafupa a anthu a ku Yerusalemu adzafukulidwa.

Adzawamwaza pa nthaka kuyangʼana dzuwa, mwezi ndi nyenyezi zonse zamlengalenga, zimene ankazikonda, kuzitumikira ndi kuzitsatira, kupemphako nzeru ndiponso kuzilambira. Mafupawo sadzawasonkhanitsa kapena kuwakwirira, koma adzakhala ngati ndowe pamwamba pa nthaka.
Otsala onse a mtundu woyipawu adzafuna imfa kopambana moyo kulikonse kumene ndidzawapirikitsirako, akutero Yehova Wamphamvuzonse.’ ”
Chifukwa chiyani nanga anthu awa akupitirirabe kuchimwa, osabwerera?
Nʼchifukwa chake akazi awo ndidzawapereka kwa amuna ena
Iwo amapoletsa zilonda za anthu anga
Kulira kwa ngʼombe zazimuna za mdani
Chifukwa cha mavuto a anthu anga, ine ndikumva kuwawa;
Kodi ku Giliyadi kulibe mankhwala ochiritsa?
